translation.en: ♪ I'm no slobby boy ♪ ♪ I never beg for no money ♪ ♪ Fun, fun, funny You'll run from me ♪ ♪ No irony, no ♪
[woman] Almost there. Just pulling the encryption key.
translation.ko: 거의 다 됐어 암호 키 받는 중이야

translation.en: Four hours in the van, and she's eaten all the crisps.
translation.ko: 스톤이 차에 4시간 있으면서 감자칩을 다 먹어 치웠어

translation.en: She's stuck in there with you, so that's comfort eating.
Been boring her with your cat chat again?
Cat chat? Actually, Parker, she likes my Barry the Cat stories.
translation.ko: 고양이 얘기? 스톤은 우리 배리 얘기 좋아해

translation.en: You like my Barry the Cat stories, right?
Before you know it, you're gonna want one of your own.
[inhales sharply] Cats hate me. Sorry, Bailey.
I have eyes on Mulvaney. Intel was good.
Europe's most wanted arms dealer seen for the first time in three years.
translation.ko: 유럽의 일급 지명 수배 무기상이 3년 만에 나타나다니

translation.en: Adding names and faces to the guest list.
translation.ko: 손님 명단에 이름과 얼굴 올리고 있어

translation.en: -How long do you need? -[Stone] Nearly there.
Hang on. Something's changed. I can't connect.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 뭔가 바뀌었어 접속이 안 돼

translation.en: We need a new plan to get you in.
I need direct access to someone who's already on the network.
translation.ko: 네트워크에 접속된 사람한테 직접 접근해야 해

translation.en: Head of security. He's at the bar.
[Stone] I could hack his phone, but I'll need to be close to him.
translation.ko: 휴대폰을 해킹하려면 그 사람 가까이 가야 해

translation.en: [Parker] Stone, you're not a field agent. Do not get out of the van.
translation.ko: 스톤, 당신은 현장 요원이 아니야 밴에서 나오지 마

translation.en: Our arms dealer's on the move right now, and I do not wanna lose him.
[Bailey] There's no other way. We have to get Mulvaney.
translation.ko: 다른 방법이 없어 멀베이니를 잡아야 해

translation.en: When I'm within ten feet of the head of security, call his phone.
translation.ko: 내가 3m 내로 접근하면 보안 책임자한테 전화해

translation.en: [Parker] I can't tail them any further.
[woman] Stone, listen to me. Waiter to your right.
translation.ko: 스톤, 잘 들어 오른쪽에 웨이터 있지?

translation.en: [Parker] He's headed towards the blackjack table.
Do you know how to play?
I was on the chess team.
[dealer] One hundred, sir, in change. Okay. Everybody ready?
Maybe I should quit while I'm ahead.
Not bad for your first time out of the van. I think I just lost two years off my life.
translation.ko: - 현장 데뷔가 나쁘지 않네 - 난 수명이 2년은 깎인 것 같아

translation.en: Okay. Got him. Through the kitchen, down the stairs.
translation.ko: 이제 보여, 주방을 통과해서 계단으로 내려가고 있어
안면 인식 시스템에 두 사람을 넣고 있어

translation.en: I'm almost afraid to see what drew Mulvaney out of his hole.
translation.ko: 숨어 있던 멀베이니가 다시 나타난 이유를 알아내는 게 두렵네

translation.en: [announcer] We're now taking bets for the next game,
which will begin in two minutes.
[woman] You were right about Mulvaney's gambling habit.
He never met a bet he didn't place.
[announcer] You must predict the exact order of kills.
[soldier] Copy, Delta Kilo Six. We have reported hostiles…
translation.ko: 알았다, DK6 적군 확인 후 보고했다

translation.en: [announcer] With a bet of four instant kills,
this is a win for player number 46.
Just a bit to your right.
That's US Navy Seals in real-time.
translation.ko: 실시간 작전 중인 미 해군 특수 부대잖아

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Yang. You have the floor.
Time to give Mulvaney his heart attack.
[Yang] I'll handle this guy. You take Mulvaney.
translation.ko: 이놈은 나한테 맡기고 당신은 멀베이니를 잡아

translation.en: Mulvaney's on your right. Another service corridor.
translation.ko: 멀베이니는 오른쪽에 있어 다른 쪽 직원용 복도에

translation.en: I've got Mulvaney. Bailey, get us out of here. Fast.
translation.ko: 멀베이니 잡았어 베일리, 빨리 데리러 와

translation.en: You guys really need to work on your subtlety.
I should've listened to the voices in my head.
"The British are coming. The British are coming."
Exfil route Bravo. We have to go dark.
translation.ko: 탈출 경로 B로 와 통신을 끊어야 해

translation.en: Copy that. See you down there.
They're heading to the cable car station. Parker's a sitting duck.
translation.ko: 케이블카 정거장으로 가네 파커가 위험해, 당장 내려가야 해

translation.en: We need to get down there now.
Jack, this is Nine of Hearts. Urgent forecast required.
translation.ko: 잭, 나인 오브 하트다 예측 경로를 긴급 요청한다

translation.en: Nine, we have your position and the full overview.
translation.ko: 나인, 당신 위치와 전체 지형을 파악했어

translation.en: The MI6 team won't get down the mountain in time.
translation.ko: MI6 팀은 제시간에 하산 못 해

translation.en: The Heart gives a 93 percent chance that Parker will die
and Mulvaney will get away unless the Charter intervenes.
Fifty meters away, over the handrail to your right.
The Heart has a chance of success at just 32 percent.

translation.ko: 그런 말은 도움 안 돼, 잭

translation.en: Um… Stone, big drop coming up.
Eight minutes out. We're not gonna make it.
Stone, Mulvaney's security are arriving at the cable car station.
translation.ko: 스톤, 멀베이니의 경호원이 케이블카 정거장에 도착했어

translation.en: Take the route to your left. You need to pick up the pace.
The terrain's too flat, and you're losing altitude.
translation.ko: 땅이 너무 평지고 고도도 떨어지고 있어

translation.en: If you cut across to the piste, you can pick up a snow bike.
translation.ko: 활강 코스로 가로질러 가면 스노 바이크를 탈 수 있어

translation.en: He can hold them off without us, right?
[Jack] You can get ahead of the bikes at the next corner.
Stone, watch Bailey and Yang to your right.
translation.ko: 스톤, 베일리와 양이 우측에 있으니 조심해

translation.en: The Charter's worked too hard to embed you in MI6.
translation.ko: 당신을 MI6에 심으려고 애 많이 썼어

translation.en: How many in the welcome party?
Four pistols, one shotgun, and a sniper
[Jack] Get away from them. Take the path to your right.
The sniper has opened fire on Parker.
Uh… two more on your right.
Parker and target still very much alive.
Now, hide the bodies and get out before MI6 sees you.
translation.ko: 이제 MI6가 보기 전에 시체 숨기고 나와

translation.en: Mulvaney had an army of security.
[Parker] Got scared off by the sirens maybe?
No point waiting to find out. Let's just grab him and go.
translation.ko: 그거 알아볼 시간 없어 빨리 저놈 데리고 가자고

translation.en: Grab a leg. We have to get back up the mountain for Stone.
translation.ko: 다리 잡아 스톤 데리러 산으로 다시 올라가야 해
좋아, 천재 양반, 이제 뭐 할까?

translation.en: ♪ For myself 'Cause I've been quiet way too long ♪
♪ Believe me, all I want is you ♪
The Italians are livid, as are Defense and Number 10.
translation.ko: 이탈리아가 잔뜩 화났어 국방부랑 총리도 그렇고

translation.en: -I take full responsibility. -[man] "I." That's your problem, Parker.
translation.ko: - 다 제 잘못입니다 - 자네는 맨날 그 소리군, 파커

translation.en: Yang gave the wrong person a heart attack.
translation.ko: 양은 엉뚱한 놈한테 심장 마비를 일으켰어

translation.en: And Stone, what the hell were you thinking getting out of the van?
translation.ko: 스톤, 자네는 무슨 자신감으로 밴 밖으로 나간 거야?

translation.en: -That was the only way she could get-- -[man] Put it in the report.
Paperwork. Excellent. That'll show Mulvaney's lads who's boss.
translation.ko: 서류 작업이라, 꼴 좋겠네요 멀베이니 부하들한테 쪽팔리게

translation.en: Mulvaney's gone. And so is any hope of using him as an asset.
translation.ko: 멀베이니가 죽어버렸으니 자산으로 쓸 수도 없게 됐어

translation.en: But now we have a new target.
Someone broke through the highest levels of military encryption, including our own.
translation.ko: 최고 단계의 군사 암호에 우리 암호까지 해킹하는 사람

translation.en: -Did you look into the girl? -[man] The girl?
Oh, yes. I'm afraid we'll need more than that.
We are trying to trace her, but so far, we have nothing.
translation.ko: 추적하는 중인데 아직 나온 게 없어

translation.en: -I'm happy to look-- -[man] We have people for that.
You can all concentrate on your admin. Sandra.
-First time out of the van. -[all] Hey!
-[Bailey] And she didn't blow the op-- -[Yang] No, we did that all on our own.
translation.ko: - 작전도 안 망쳤고 - 그래, 다 우리 잘못이지

translation.en: Too bad. Been on a good winning streak since Stone joined us.
translation.ko: 아쉬워, 스톤이 합류하고 계속 성공하고 있었잖아

translation.en: Thought you might be our lucky charm. But you did win at blackjack.
translation.ko: 당신이 행운의 부적인가 했는데 그래도 블랙잭은 이겼으니까, 뭐

translation.en: And I'm never gambling again or stepping out of the van.
translation.ko: 다시는 도박 안 해 밴에서도 안 나갈 거야

translation.en: What'd you do when I left you up there?
-What? You said to stay out of sight. -True.
translation.ko: 왜? 숨어 있으라면서 - 그랬지 - 그만해, 놀리지 마

translation.en: We got more important things to discuss. Like, the girl.
translation.ko: 중요한 일을 논의해야지 그 여자 얘기 말이야

translation.en: But let's be honest. We already know who she works for.
Whatever. I just identified another one of their ops.
translation.ko: 됐거든요? 내가 이번에 차터의 요원을 또 하나 찾았어

translation.en: They took out a terror cell who hijacked an oil tanker in the Panama Canal.
translation.ko: 파나마 운하에서 유조선을 납치한 테러 조직을 처치했더라고

translation.en: Yeah, but who would have that kind of power?
Ex-intelligence operatives answering only to themselves.
No national allegiances, no political leanings.
translation.ko: 국가에 대한 충성심도 정치적 성향도 없다고

translation.en: Putting out fires their governments never allowed them to. That's…
translation.ko: 정부가 허가하지도 않은 작전을 독자적으로 진행하는 게

translation.en: working together to keep peace in a turbulent world.
translation.ko: 어지러운 세상에서 평화를 지키기 위해 뭉친 단체

translation.en: No. That is a Saturday morning cartoon.
Nobody knows about the Charter because they don't exist.
translation.ko: 차터 같은 건 없어 그러니까 아무도 모르지

translation.en: This girl is part of it, and you know it.
Okay, don't judge me. I'm gonna go with this for a sec.
translation.ko: 나 욕하지 마 잠깐 장단 좀 맞춰볼게
그 여자는 우리 임무를 왜 방해했을까?

translation.en: Sorry, Bailey, there is no secret genius organization pulling all the strings.
translation.ko: 베일리, 모든 일을 통제하는 비밀 천재 조직 같은 건 없어

translation.en: It's just us, Sandra, and her paperwork.
translation.ko: 우리랑 산드라 서류 작업 같은 거나 있지

translation.en: But it was a nice bedtime story. Speaking of which…
-Jet lag. -Um, there's a one-hour time difference.
translation.ko: 시차 때문에 피곤해 한 시간 차이잖아

translation.en: -I drive with that eye. -Might make you a better driver.
translation.ko: - 운전할 때 쓰는 귀한 눈인데 - 내 덕에 실력이 늘지도

translation.en: A field agent should be ready for anything.
translation.ko: 현장 요원은 모든 일에 항상 대비하고 있어야지

translation.en: You were saying? I never should have told you I swim.
translation.ko: 무슨 얘기 중이었지? 수영한다는 말 괜히 했네

translation.en: No news. We were told not to look.
Look, if we leave it to the pen-pushers at MI6,
translation.ko: 사무 업무나 하는 MI6 인간들한테 맡겨두면

translation.en: she'll hack the entire world before we even get a name.
translation.ko: 이름 알아내기도 전에 그 여자가 세상 암호를 다 해킹할걸

translation.en: I should've gone beyond the mission and brought her in.
translation.ko: 임무랑 상관없이 잡아 올 걸 그랬어

translation.en: Well, your hands were pretty full at the time.
And besides, it wasn't our objective.
Why don't you try and live a little? Could be fun.
translation.ko: 좀 적극적으로 살아봐 그러면 재밌을 텐데

translation.en: What happened to "Don't get out of the van, Rachel"? Ah.
translation.ko: 밴에서 나오지 말라고 할 때는 언제고?

translation.en: So, rules are rules unless they apply to you.
Why do I feel like you know me better than I know you?
translation.ko: 왜 내가 당신을 아는 것보다 당신이 날 잘 아는 것 같지?

translation.en: Maybe I should listen to one of these dreary podcasts of yours.
translation.ko: 당신이 듣는 따분한 팟캐스트를 들어보면 알려나

translation.en: Mock our music, and I won't tell you my theory.
translation.ko: 우리 음악 취향 비웃으면 내 생각 안 알려줄 거야

translation.en: She's new to the scene. Has to be. Otherwise, we would have heard about her.
translation.ko: 새로운 인물 같아, 분명해 아니면 우리가 몰랐을 리 없지

translation.en: To get a guest list like that--
She's working with someone else. A veteran. But who?
We'll make a list. I'll bring snacks.
translation.ko: 명단을 작성해 보자고 내가 간식 가져올게

translation.en: I, uh, I'm sorry. I already have… a brunch date.
Nine of Hearts, it's good to see you.
-How's it going? -It's been busy. This way.
The Charter has been dealing with three actionable threats this morning.
translation.ko: 오늘 오전에는 세 건의 위협 가능성에 대응하는 중이야

translation.en: Potential sarin gas attack in Paris.
translation.ko: 파리에 사린 가스 공격 가능성이 있는데

translation.en: The Heart predicted the time and location of the attack with 87% certainty.
translation.ko: 하트가 87%의 정확도로 공격 시간과 위치를 예측해서

translation.en: Eight of Hearts is on site now.
translation.ko: 에이트 오브 하트가 현장에 나가 있어

translation.en: Six is defusing a potential international incident
translation.ko: 식스는 남중국해에서 국제 분쟁이 일어날 상황이라

translation.en: And Diamonds team's handling hackers targeting the North American power grid.
translation.ko: 다이아몬드 팀은 북미 전력망을 공격하는 해커들을 처리하고 있어

translation.en: -[peafowl caws] -[Stone] Hey, Jack. Enjoying your new office?
We can't all be gallivanting around the Alps.
translation.ko: 모두가 알프스를 누비는 특권을 누릴 순 없으니까

translation.en: How's King of Hearts? Is she angry?
Well, let's see. You lost control of the situation, target is dead,
translation.ko: 어디 보자 자네는 상황 통제도 못 했고 타깃은 죽은 데다 사람을 여섯이나 죽였어

translation.en: then you had to kill six men.
translation.ko: 타깃은 죽은 데다 사람을 여섯이나 죽였어
아주 눈부신 성과야 나라에서 훈장이라도 줘야겠어
아주 눈부신 성과야 나라에서 훈장이라도 줘야겠어 안녕하세요, 노마드

translation.en: Good to see you too. Love what you've done with the place.
Is she developing a sense of humor?
She is from Pune in the west of India.
Ran IT workshops for kids in underprivileged communities.
translation.ko: 소외 계층 아동들한테 IT 교육을 지원했대

translation.en: [Stone] He spotted her in one of these programs.
Yeah. He saw she was a prodigy, took her under his wing, trained her up,
translation.ko: 응, 영재인 걸 알아보고 직접 거둬서 키운 거야

translation.en: and then they had a falling out.
[Nomad] The Heart's better at whats than whys.
And the what is, she split from Kharche and disappeared.
Not much older than when we met.
translation.ko: 내가 당신을 만난 것도 그 나이쯤이었죠

translation.en: [Nomad] Yes, but she fell in with a bunch of criminal lowlifes.
Some people get all the luck.
We think that Keya set up the casino of blood.
translation.ko: 케야가 피의 카지노를 설계한 것 같아

translation.en: She knew about Mulvaney's gambling habit and used it to lure him in.
translation.ko: 도박을 좋아하는 멀베이니를 유인하는 데 이용한 거지

translation.en: Mulvaney had become obsessed with a new weapon, a myth.
translation.ko: 멀베이니가 전설 같은 새 무기에 미쳐 있거든

translation.en: A quantum computer sophisticated enough to hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.ko: 세상 모든 걸 해킹할 수 있는 정교한 양자 컴퓨터

translation.en: that Keya is heading to Lisbon for the opening of Club Moritz.
translation.ko: 클럽 모리츠 오픈 때문에 리스본으로 가는 중이야

translation.en: So, we will leak her location to MI6.
translation.ko: 그래서 MI6에 케야의 소재를 흘릴 거야

translation.en: Then we should have your operation back up and running within 24 hours.
translation.ko: 그럼 24시간 내에 자네 작전을 재개할 수 있어

translation.en: Keya chose to hack into our comms feed on the mountain.
She revealed herself to me, looked me straight in the eye.
translation.ko: 자기 모습을 드러내고 내 눈을 똑바로 봤다고요

translation.en: I'm not sure if we should ignore the Heart,
the closest mankind has to perfect intelligence,
translation.ko: 완벽에 가까운 지능을 가진 컴퓨터를 무시하라고?

translation.en: because of eye contact in a bar.
translation.ko: 바에서 눈 좀 마주친 것 때문에?

translation.en: This might be why you're single, Jack.
Just not with your MI6 team.
So, you're spying on me now.
You know what you signed up for.
What we do is too important.
translation.ko: 우린 아주 중요한 일을 하고 있어

translation.en: When governments fail, the only thing left is the Charter.
translation.ko: 정부가 역할을 못 하면 믿을 건 차터뿐이니까

translation.en: I'm undercover. This is just part of it.
translation.ko: 저는 잠입 요원이잖아요 녹아들려면 어쩔 수 없죠

translation.en: Come on, Keya. Take the bait.
[Bailey] Hey. We got a lead on hacker girl. We're going to Lisbon.
translation.ko: 해커 소녀에 대한 단서를 찾았어 리스본으로 갈 거야

translation.en: Oh no, no. Barry's all right. He's--
[Parker] Ah Jesus. Just when we thought it couldn't get worse.
-[Bailey] Are you singing? -[Parker] I'm clearing my throat.
♪ I want to be with you everywhere ♪ ♪ Oh, I ♪
Bailey, you should meet my gran. She has the same taste in music,
translation.ko: 베일리, 우리 할머니 만나볼래? 자네랑 음악 취향이 똑같거든

translation.en: and you have the same hair.
Little harder next time. I didn't quite crack a tooth.
translation.ko: 이 정도 흔들어서 내 치아가 깨지겠어?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just, uh…
Come on, swap seats with me.
-What? No, no, no. It's fine. -Come on. No, it's fine. Move.
[Parker] Aren't you supposed to be an elite driver?
[Yang] How long till the club opens?
[Bailey] We head out in a couple of hours.
Sent you something. Check it out.
-What is this? -It's for my niece's birthday.
What do you think? Female perspective?
-What are you, a hundred years old? -It's called culture.
Yeah. Sorry, Parker, I'm with Yang. Yang!
Oh, come on, Bailey. You know you want to.
translation.ko: 이리 와, 베일리 당신도 추고 싶잖아

translation.en: [Bailey] You know you want to. Come on.
Watch out, you might actually enjoy yourself.
Six hostiles moving up the stairs. More outside.
translation.ko: 적 6명이 올라가는 중이고 밖에도 더 있어

translation.en: They'll breach the doorway in four…
Come on. Parker, come on. Come on!
Saving them is not your mission.
translation.ko: 그 사람들 구하는 건 당신 임무가 아니야

translation.en: No. At best, you break cover. Most likely, you die.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 정체를 들키거나 당신이 죽을 거야

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It works. Just not on every car.
translation.ko: 응, 아무 차에나 안 먹혀서 그렇지

translation.en: -Away from the guns, Stone. Away! -Just a second.
Okay, Stone. Time to start talking.
You hack, you fight, and you drive. Parker, are you getting this?
translation.ko: 해킹에 격투에 운전까지 하네 파커, 이 상황 이해가 돼?

translation.en: -Three vehicles. Lots of guns. -Yeah, I can tell by the bullets.
translation.ko: - 차 3대에 총이 한 다발이야 - 그러니까 총알 세례겠지

translation.en: -Stone! -Sort of in the middle of something.
Oh, okay. Okay, you got it.
-Are you trying to kill us? -Pretty much the opposite, actually.
translation.ko: 우리 죽일 셈이야? 살리려고 이러는 거잖아

translation.en: Okay. This might be kind of intense.
Well, I can't speak for the others, but I… I think you're ready for the field.
translation.ko: 다들 어떻게 생각할지 모르지만 이제 현장에서 뛰어도 되겠는걸

translation.en: We need to get off the road and lose this van.
a baby agent from IT just took out an entire kill team.
translation.ko: 풋내기 IT 요원이 킬러 팀을 싹 다 처치했어
- 베일리, 아직도 감이 안 와? - 젠장

translation.en: The Charter? You're the… you're the bloody Charter?
What, are you trying to bring in Dhawan yourself?
I wish I could've told you more.
But we all want the same thing.
You're not the only one with a secret.
Did they mean something to you?
Oh, come on, Rachel. You're only playing a part, right?
translation.ko: 왜 이래, 레이첼 그냥 연기하는 거잖아

translation.en: Why don't you ask the Heart?
If you wanted me dead, you would have shot me first.
[exhales] Still a few things I need to know.
I was looking forward to a fight.
Keya and I learned that the Charter infiltrated MI6.
translation.ko: 케야랑 난 차터가 MI6에 요원을 심은 걸 알게 됐어

translation.en: I had to flush out who.
At first, I thought it was Yang,
but I was so pleased it was you.
A little basic, I know, but it hits the spot.
Looks like the paralysis is kicking in.
I spent six years looking for you people, Stone.
Then fate brings you straight to me.
But you were so busy letting a machine think for you that you missed me.
translation.ko: 근데 기계에만 의존하느라 날 간과하고 말았네

translation.en: Well, he was tech-averse like me.
So, Keya and I set up our casino of blood to lure him in.
translation.ko: 그래서 놈을 끌어내려고 케야랑 카지노를 준비했어

translation.en: We needed to have a little chat about the Heart.
The Heart is what gives the Charter its power.
It's the most formidable weapon you never knew existed.
It can hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.ko: 세상의 모든 걸 해킹할 수 있어

translation.en: Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.
translation.ko: 휴대폰, 전력망, 은행 정부, 군대, 건강 기록

translation.en: It knows you better than you know yourself.
translation.ko: 나보다 나를 더 잘 아는 존재야

translation.en: With access to trillions of data points at once, its modeling is so accurate
translation.ko: 엄청난 양의 데이터 포인트에 동시 접근해서 모델링이 정확하고

translation.en: The Heart is knowledge and power.
It can crash a market or drop a plane out of the sky.
translation.ko: 시장을 무너뜨리거나 비행기를 추락시킬 수도 있어

translation.en: Who needs to steal a nuclear bomb when you can control them all?
translation.ko: 모든 걸 좌지우지할 수 있다면 핵폭탄을 훔칠 필요도 없겠지

translation.en: Only a Charter member could tell you.
My chemist does all the classics.
translation.ko: 나랑 거래하는 화학자는 옛날 약품을 많이 쓰거든

translation.en: Killing you is not part of the plan. We need you to deliver a package first.
translation.ko: 널 죽이는 건 계획에 없어 네가 뭘 배달해 줘야 하거든

translation.en: [nurse panting] Hold her here. Hold her down.
-[grunting] -Take this. Help me. Help me here.
Wait. Get me atropine. Five mils.
It's… There's a Trojan in our system delivered wirelessly.
translation.ko: 우리 시스템에 무선으로 트로이 목마가 전송돼서

translation.en: Chewing through security like it isn't there.
Nomad, I've tried. No-go. They're trying to access the Heart.
translation.ko: 해봤는데 안 됩니다 하트에 접근하려고 해요

translation.en: It's a weak wireless signal. It's coming from…
[doctor] Quickly. We need to monitor her airway.
-[Stone breathing heavily] -Stone. What's happened? I need to know what's happened.
translation.ko: 스톤, 어떻게 된 거야? 무슨 일인지 말해봐

translation.en: [Jack] Three minutes and 45 seconds. Running a system check now.
We need to know what they accessed. Is the Locker safe?
The Locker is still flying high
with the Heart safe inside, 85,000 feet up.
No one's getting up there without a space shuttle.
translation.ko: 우주선 없이는 아무도 저기 못 가요

translation.en: It's passing over the Atlantic, towards West Africa.
And the other suits, can they still access the Heart?
translation.ko: 다른 팀도 하트에 접속 가능한 상태야?

translation.en: There've been 100,000 attempts to access files.
Clubs team are analyzing the data, but looks like our security held.
translation.ko: 클럽 팀이 데이터 분석 중인데 보안은 유지됐던 것 같습니다

translation.en: We need to shut it all down now.
-Shut what down? The Heart? -Until we know what they've done.
We have no idea what they're capable of.
Don't need to shut it down to find out what they've done.
-We'd be harming ourselves. -We don't know. She's not stupid.
translation.ko: - 그럼 우리만 손해야 - 놈들에 대해 모르잖아 케야는 바보가 아니야

translation.en: -And neither are we. -Sure about that? Because right now--
Rachel. Rachel. He's right. We'll sort it.
translation.ko: 레이첼, 잭 말이 맞아 우리가 해결할게

translation.en: I told you. I knew Keya was playing us, playing the Heart.
translation.ko: 제가 그랬죠? 케야가 우리랑 하트를 갖고 노는 거라고

translation.en: No, you didn't. No, you didn't You had a feeling.
A mood, a notion, a hunch, a bollocks. We don't trade in those.
translation.ko: 우린 기분이나 생각 감 따위는 취급 안 해

translation.en: I knew she wouldn't be there.
You ignored the Heart, and you went back in.
translation.ko: 자네는 하트를 무시하고 그 안에 다시 들어갔어

translation.en: -To save my team. -They weren't your team.
translation.ko: - 우리 팀을 구하려고요 - 자네 팀이 아니야

translation.en: They died anyway. You going back made sure of that.
If you'd left when we told you to, Parker would've followed you,
translation.ko: 우리 말대로 나갔으면 파커가 자네를 따라가서

translation.en: we'd have caught him, and Yang and Bailey might be alive.
translation.ko: 우리가 파커를 잡았을 거고 양과 베일리는 지금 살아 있겠지

translation.en: -I should've just listened to the Heart? -Yes.
translation.ko: 그럼 그냥 하트의 말을 들어야 했나요? 그래

translation.en: The Charter exists for one reason.
To maximize lives saved. That's the only moral metric there is.
translation.ko: 최대한 많은 생명을 살리는 거 그게 유일한 윤리적 기준이고 그건 계산으로 도출돼

translation.en: And it's a calculation. A pure and objective calculation.
translation.ko: 그게 유일한 윤리적 기준이고 그건 계산으로 도출돼 순수하고 객관적인 계산

translation.en: Made for us by a machine.
Have you forgotten how radical that is?
It doesn't mean that what we do is easy or feels nice.
translation.ko: 우리가 하는 일이 쉽거나 마음이 편하다는 게 아니야

translation.en: You'll have the voices of those people in your head for the rest of your life.
translation.ko: 우리를 비난하는 목소리가 평생 머릿속을 맴돌겠지

translation.en: And you will never not feel responsible for them ever.
translation.ko: 그 죄책감에서 절대 못 벗어날 거고

translation.en: But the end justifies the means.
I spent every day with Parker for a year and didn't see it coming.
translation.ko: 1년 내내 파커를 보면서도 눈치를 못 챘어요

translation.en: So, what do we do now?
Gonna make some tough choices, and this is the first one.
Keep your head down. Don't do anything stupid.
Parker knows you. Dhawan knows you.
And the other Kings, quite rightly… don't know if you can be trusted.
translation.ko: 당연하지만 다른 킹들도 자네를 믿지 못할 거고

translation.en: I want to protect what we've spent 20 years trying to build.
translation.ko: 난 우리가 20년간 쌓아온 걸 지키고 싶어

translation.en: [Keya] So, why is a Charter agent riding around all alone,
translation.ko: 왜 차터 요원이 혼자 버스를 타고 다니시나?
독 맞은 지 몇 시간이나 됐다고

translation.en: Doesn't feel like they're taking care of their most valuable player.
translation.ko: 제일 귀중한 플레이어한테 대접이 소홀한 것 같네

translation.en: I bet you used to think we were so alike. Now you know I'm better.
translation.ko: 우리가 비슷하다고 생각했지? 이제 내가 낫다는 걸 알겠지만

translation.en: Well, I told you this wasn't a game, Keya.
All four kings in the same room. How long has it been, three years?
translation.ko: 킹들이 한자리에 모인 게 얼마 만이죠? 3년 만인가요?

translation.en: So, who is this Parker, and how did we miss him?
Career intelligence agent. Born in Belfast, lives alone.
translation.ko: 전문 정보 요원이에요 벨파스트 태생이고 혼자 살아요

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 사람이 없으니 삶의 이유가 별로 없어

translation.en: He has devoted his life to a country that sees him as expendable.
translation.ko: 자길 소모품 취급 하는 나라에 평생을 헌신했고

translation.en: Okay. We get it. All that is fuel for the fire.
translation.ko: 그래, 그게 불에 기름을 부은 건 맞지만

translation.en: -But it won't burn without a spark. -[woman] I was getting to that.
translation.ko: 애초에 불이 난 계기가 있을 거 아니야 지금 말하려고 하잖아

translation.en: I had to lean extremely hard on some very old friends for this.
translation.ko: 이거 때문에 오랜 친구를 아주 귀찮게 닦달했어

translation.en: It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.
translation.ko: 자네가 들어오기 전 일이야 하트가 만들어지기도 전의 일

translation.en: A Chechen warlord was given free rein by the Chechen and Russian governments.
translation.ko: 체첸과 러시아 정부가 체첸의 군 지도자한테 고삐를 쥐여줬어

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.
translation.ko: 서구에서는 늘 그렇듯 그걸 모른 체했고

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.
translation.ko: 그자는 반대파를 없애려고 온 지역을 다 몰살해 버렸지

translation.en: But… what's this got to do with Parker?

translation.ko: 신분도 바꿨고 전자 기록도 전혀 없지만

translation.en: But he was there, with MI6,
delivering weapons to take the warlord out.
translation.ko: 그 군 지도자를 끌어내리기 위한 무기를 전달하러 간 거야

translation.en: [King] Intelligence came through from MI6 that their entire team had been executed.
translation.ko: MI6를 통해 그 팀이 전멸했다는 정보가 들어와서

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.ko: 그 지역은 전면적인 내전이 일어나기 직전이어서

translation.en: We couldn't let those weapons fall into the warlord's hands.
translation.ko: 무기가 군 지도자 손에 들어가게 놔둘 순 없었어

translation.en: It would have cost thousands of lives.
translation.ko: 그랬다가는 수천 명이 목숨을 잃을 테니까

translation.en: We had a drone that was stationed overhead armed with missiles.
translation.ko: 우린 미사일 탑재 드론을 상공에 배치하고 있었어

translation.en: We made it look like a rebel force had ordered the drone strike.
translation.ko: 우린 반군이 드론 공격을 지시한 것처럼 꾸몄어

translation.en: No record of the personnel who had been involved.
translation.ko: 관련 요원들에 대한 아무 기록도 안 남겼지

translation.en: So, you think… he knows it was us?
translation.ko: 우리 짓이었다는 걸 그자가 아는 걸까?

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.
And now he wants to destroy the Charter.
You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.ko: 넌 기술적인 거나 해 전략은 나한테 맡기고

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.ko: 잊었나 본데 우린 파트너예요 내가 내 몫 잘하길 바라면

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.ko: 무슨 일을 하기 전에 나한테도 미리 말해요

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits
translation.ko: 너도 잊었나 본데 베일리나 양 같은 사람한테 차터는 쥐뿔도 신경 안 써

translation.en: about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.ko: 베일리나 양 같은 사람한테 차터는 쥐뿔도 신경 안 써

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.ko: 그러니까 우리 일이 성공하길 바라면 너도 신경 꺼

translation.en: I'm a friend of your dad's.
She hacked into the camera feed.
Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.ko: 자기 흔적을 얼마나 잘 숨겼는지 볼까?

translation.en: I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
[Parker] You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.ko: 4만 피트 상공에서 헬기 조종해 본 적 있어?
교묘한 질문이네 그런 걸 누가 해봐?

translation.en: But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리 어머니가 난 뭐든 할 수 있다고 하셨어

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends?
At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart,
translation.ko: 우린 8분 안에 거기 들어가 하트를 가지고 나와야 해요

translation.en: and get out again before they regain control.
No. I'll be sure when it descends.
translation.ko: 아니요, 로커가 내려와야 확실히 알 수 있어요

translation.en: If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.ko: 내 코드를 들키면 안 내려오고 차터가 우릴 기다렸다 죽이겠죠

translation.en: Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
Oh no, no, no, no, no.
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
Nomad will string me up for this.
Tell her I stole your keys.
You'll just have to trust me.
How will we know if it's worked?
The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes.
Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
translation.ko: 보안 시스템은 다 다운됐고 제 손발도 묶였습니다

translation.en: -How is that even possible? Another hack? -No. No.
This is why they did it the first time.
It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
translation.ko: 지금까지 우리 시스템에 숨어 있었던 거라고요

translation.en: Contact every Charter agent in the region.
translation.ko: 그쪽에 있는 차터 멤버한테 전부 연락해

translation.en: [pilot] Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
-I hope you know what you're doing. -[Stone] Tell me about it.
-We have a something approaching fast. -[Nomad] A something?
I think-- I think it's a someone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
[Parker] Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.ko: 이 안은 수소로 가득해서 불꽃만 튀어도 다 죽어요

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
I told you not to get out of the van.
You also told me to have some fun.
And now you answer to me.
[Parker] Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
-We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -[grunts]
Give me that thing before somebody gets--
You're gonna secret-agent our way back to civilization,
translation.ko: 비밀 요원 실력 발휘해서 문명사회로 돌아가는 길을 찾아

translation.en: and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.ko: 난 이 총을 들고 세 걸음 뒤에서 따라갈 거야

translation.en: But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.ko: 내 생체 인증을 걸어놔서 나 없이는 무용지물이지만

translation.en: If I shoot you now, all this is over.
Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.ko: 너도 베일리와 양처럼 한 방에 보내줄 수 있어

translation.en: It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.ko: 널 펜트하우스에서 쫓아낸 니암 카르체한테 복수하는 거?

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
translation.ko: 그래, 본인이 모든 걸 다 안다고 생각하지?

translation.en: I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me,
translation.ko: 니암이 날 입양해서 '구원'해 줬다고 하트가 그랬겠지

translation.en: lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.ko: 니암이 날 입양해서 '구원'해 줬다고 하트가 그랬겠지 그런데 입양 이유도 알려줬어?

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.ko: 카르체는 임상 실험에 내 부모님을 실험 쥐처럼 이용하고 죽였어

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.ko: 그걸 다 은폐하고는 은혜를 베푸는 척 날 거뒀지만

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.ko: 난 모르는 척 놔뒀어 나중에 내가 힘이 생기면

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.ko: 우리 부모님한테 한 짓을 그대로 되돌려 줄 거니까

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down?
translation.ko: 그렇다고 온 세상을 무너뜨려도 되는 거야?

translation.en: Oh, this is not just for me. It's for people like me.
translation.ko: 나만을 위해서가 아니야 나 같은 사람들을 위해서지

translation.en: I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.ko: 난 내가 갖고 있는 치부 목록을 폭로할 거야

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
And you think the Charter's any better?
Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.ko: 차터가 당신을 살려줬다고 좋은 사람들인 건 아니야

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
translation.ko: 내가 당신 뒤는 안 캐봤을까 봐?

translation.en: How many schools did you get kicked out of?
Always a rebel. Always a problem.
And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.ko: 당신이 원하는 방식으로 훈련을 시켜준 거지

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
But there's a woman I know only as Nomad.
translation.ko: 하지만 내가 노마드라고 부르는 사람이 있어

translation.en: showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.ko: 뒤에서 도와주는 사람만 있다면 가능성이 있다는 걸 알려준 분이야

translation.en: Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.ko: 파커가 널 찾으러 올 테니 더 강력한 무기가 필요해

translation.en: Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story.
They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.ko: 몸값 받으려고 우릴 살려둘 테니 놈들을 속이다가 확 덮치는 거야

translation.en: Just to be clear, the "bam" is for you to take them out.
translation.ko: 참고로 확 덮친다는 건 당신이 죽이라는 얘기야

translation.en: [woman in French] Who are you? And what the hell are you doing out here?
translation.ko: 당신들 누구예요? 여기서 뭐 하는 거죠?

translation.en: [in English] You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
translation.ko: 차터가 카르체를 처치해 줄 수 있어

translation.en: Parker's way isn't the only way.
[in French] How can we repay you?
Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.ko: 죽이라고도 안 했잖아요 빨리 돈이나 줘요

translation.en: You're a hard woman to find.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.ko: 다완이 파커한테 돌아갔어요 제가 추적기를 달아놨는데 북쪽으로 가고 있네요

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.ko: 제가 추적기를 달아놨는데 북쪽으로 가고 있네요 추적 상황 공유할게요

translation.en: Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
I take it I'm no longer compromised.
translation.ko: 이제 저를 위험 요소로 생각하지 않으시나 봐요

translation.en: Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
translation.ko: 그자들이 하트를 가져갔으니 우리 모두 위험해졌다고 봐야지

translation.en: Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.ko: 파커가 차터를 노리고 있어서 안전한 장소로 가는 중이야

translation.en: We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.ko: 자네가 갈 때까지 요원들이 도착하도록 할게

translation.en: Just get there as fast as you can.
If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.ko: 하트를 온라인에 연결하면 놈들이 무슨 짓을 할지 몰라

translation.en: It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
[Stone] Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland?
translation.ko: 이 고물 덩어리로 아이슬란드까지 갈 수 있을까?

translation.en: Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday.
translation.ko: 어제 안면 인식 설정한 거 머리 잘 썼던데

translation.en: Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
translation.ko: 그걸 안 해놨으면 날 찾으러 왔겠어요?

translation.en: I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.ko: 어디로 가는지 알겠어요 레이캬비크 대학교 컴퓨터 랩이요

translation.en: It has a cryo-storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.ko: 거기에 몇 층 규모의 서버들과 초저온 저장 시설이 있습니다

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.ko: 자, 준비해, 각자 할 일 알지?

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.ko: 하트가 이메일, 문자, 은행 계좌를 내 알고리듬에 따라 정리 중이에요

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
translation.ko: 그럼 누구든 찾을 수 있고 어디에든 다 접속 가능해?

translation.en: Greatest skeleton key in the world.
Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.ko: 카르체가 무고한 사람들한테 오랫동안 진행한 실험들의 증거

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.ko: 이게 바로 모든 사람이 알아야 할 진실이에요

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
translation.ko: 대단하네, 이런 거 말고도 뭘 할 수 있는지 보자고

translation.en: [woman] Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex-CIA.
translation.ko: 낸시 모리슨, 전직 CIA 일명 킹 오브 다이아몬드

translation.en: The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.ko: 하트에 따르면 가족들과 안전 가옥으로 이동 중입니다

translation.en: [man] Hang on. I have another one.
I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.ko: 33분 전에 미확인 군용기가 개인 비행장에 착륙했어요

translation.en: Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.ko: 지앙 슈, 중국 안보국에서 35년 동안 근무했어요

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
Even better. Where is he now?
Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.ko: 건물 도면 전송 중이야 스톤이 가고 있어

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
Any news of Spades or Hearts?
There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.ko: 카르체와 차터를 폭로한다고 했지 죽인다고는 안 했잖아요

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.ko: 킹 오브 하트는 자기 팀과 런던 외곽의 벙커에 있어요

translation.en: -We'll see you on the other side. -You're going in with them?
I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.ko: 내가 파커 공격을 명령했어 같이 가는 게 도리지

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.ko: 저기, 체첸 사건은 나라도 그렇게 했을 거야

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
translation.ko: 이 속도라면 한 시간이요 산소도 다 떨어졌습니다

translation.en: The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.ko: 차터는 걸림돌이 되는 자들한테 연민 따위 없어 우리도 그럴 거야

translation.en: [woman] King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
translation.ko: 킹 오브 하트가 갇혔어요 한 시간이면 다 죽을 겁니다

translation.en: -You have to stop this, please. -Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.ko: - 제발 멈춰요 - 누군가는 그 힘을 통제해야 해

translation.en: -Why not us? -This is not what we agreed.
translation.ko: - 우리라고 왜 안 돼? - 약속이 다르잖아요

translation.en: You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had with the bad man who killed your mom and dad.
translation.ko: 네 부모 죽인 놈한테 복수나 하려는 게 아니야

translation.en: Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.ko: 극소수만 그 힘을 가졌고 그걸 좋은 일에 사용해서

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.ko: 변화를 만들 수 있는데 그자들은 그러지 않잖아

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.ko: 우린 지금 어마어마한 양의 데이터를 캐내고 있어

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down
translation.ko: 몇 시간만 있으면 차터의 남은 멤버들을 다 끝장낼 수 있게 돼

translation.en: the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.ko: 차터의 남은 멤버들을 다 끝장낼 수 있게 돼

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives.
Now it's time for us to take control.
[man] Clubs team are inside the university building.
You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.ko: 위대한 사람들이 어떻게 힘을 얻는지 알아?

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
It is because when the moment comes,
Stone, you need to get out now.
I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart.
translation.ko: 내가 하트를 다운시키려고 자동 안전장치를 업로드 중이야

translation.en: They won't be able to access it without me.
I'm outside. But you already know that.
translation.ko: 나 밖에 있어, 알 거 아니야

translation.en: No, you're not. It's a trap.
The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.ko: 연구실은 미끼야 당장 당신 팀을 내보내

translation.en: -Why should I believe you? -Because you were right.
translation.ko: - 널 어떻게 믿고? - 당신 말이 맞았어

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.ko: 파커 얘기도 그렇고 당신 말이 다 옳았다고

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.ko: 우리 부모님은 이런 일 원치 않으셨을 거야

translation.en: Get your team out of there right now.
I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.ko: 내 좌표 보내고 있어 뒷문 열어놓을게

translation.en: [grunts] I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
translation.ko: 나인 오브 하트예요 무전기 좀 쓸게요

translation.en: This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.ko: 여기는 나인 오브 하트 거기서 나와라, 함정이다

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
translation.ko: 들리나? 케야가 추적기를 찾았다 당장 거기서 나와라

translation.en: I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
translation.ko: 그게… 몇 분일지 몇 시간일지 몰라요

translation.en: You have until I get back.
[Ivo] There must be an emergency override system.
Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
No. No comms. We're still offline.
translation.ko: 아니요, 통신이 안 돼요 아직도 오프라인입니다

translation.en: -[Nomad] Stone, thank God. Where are you? -Clubs are dead.
translation.ko: 드디어 됐네, 지금 어디야? 클럽 팀이 죽었어요

translation.en: [Stone] Keya. She shut down the Heart.
-How do you know she's not playing you? -I don't.
[Nomad] We're gonna die in less than an hour.
translation.ko: 우린 한 시간 안에 죽을 거야

translation.en: -She shut down our air supply. -[Stone] Parker did.
I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her.
translation.ko: 걔 말대로 안 했으면 저도 죽었을 거예요

translation.en: I trust her, and you need to trust me.
translation.ko: 제가 케야를 믿으니 팀장님도 저를 믿으세요

translation.en: [Parker] I know you're in here, Keya.
You know, you still have a choice.
You can still be a part of this.

translation.ko: 네가 막으려 해도 어차피 일어날 일이야

translation.en: -Would you like me to wait? -[Stone] Definitely no.
No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.ko: 하트를 서버에서 뺐다가 다시 연결해야 하거든요

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.ko: 간섭이 발생하면 시스템이 자동으로 꺼지는 거 알잖아요

translation.en: This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.ko: 이러면 너한테 좋을 거 없어 한 발짝만 움직이면 죽일 거야

translation.en: -I don't care. I'm here for you. -[Parker] Bullshit.
translation.ko: 상관없어, 너 때문에 왔으니까 웃기지 마

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies,
translation.ko: 하트를 복구 못 해서 벙커 안의 모두가 죽어

translation.en: unless, of course, they're dead already.
I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.ko: 하트도 킹도 내가 쥐고 있어 승리 패가 내 손에 있다고

translation.en: Good girl. Now, kick it away.
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
translation.ko: 왜 네 목적을 이루려고 그 사람들을 죽여야 해?

translation.en: I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered.
translation.ko: 내 평생을 봉사했지만 다 의미 없는 짓이었어

translation.en: The world is still in chaos.
The Heart has the power to change everything.
translation.ko: 하트만 있으면 모든 걸 바꿀 수 있어

translation.en: But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.ko: 하지만 차터는 하트를 현상 유지하는 데만 쓰지

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.ko: 넌 뭘 바꾸려는 게 아니라 네가 쥐고 흔들려는 거잖아

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
translation.ko: 네가 하트를 손에 넣고 제일 먼저 한 게 살인이야

translation.en: [scoffs] The problem with men like you, Parker,
is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.ko: 주변 사람들과 네 팀한테 그렇게 잔인하게 굴면

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.ko: 내게 늘 있는 한 가지를 넌 절대 가질 수 없어

translation.en: See you when I get there. [exhales]
It's good to hear from you, Stone.
[girl] But what is it? Who's it from?
I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
And you? Back with the Charter?
[inhales] Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.
If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.ko: 확률만 따른다면 가능성이 없을 땐 아무 행동도 하지 않겠지

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
I wanna surround myself with people who will change the world for good.
translation.ko: 좋은 세상을 만들고자 하는 사람들과 함께하고 싶어

translation.en: The good news, I've scouted the square, and your plan just might work.
translation.ko: 좋은 소식은 광장을 정찰해 보니 당신 계획이 성공할 것 같단 거야

translation.en: [exhales] Uh, they were out of oat milk.
What? You told me to blend in.
Did we get into the power grid?
Yeah. It wasn't that hard, because their password was "password."
Um, you know we can still throw you in jail, right?
We stay in the van, boss.
-The Heart's all set. -[Stone] And the diversion?
